sections.title: Global Goods Index
sections.content: Compare prices of different products in various countries using data from Numbeo.com.

sections.title: Target Audience
sections.content: Designed for travelers, researchers, and anyone exploring global price trends.

sections.title: Developer Information
sections.content: Created by the Global Goods Index Team. Contact: support@globalgoodsindex.com

sections.title: Acknowledgment
sections.content: This app uses data from Numbeo.com. Visit their site for more details.

sections.title: Disclaimer
sections.content: The price data is sourced from Numbeo.com and may not always be accurate. Use this app at your own risk.

sections.title: Feedback
sections.content: We welcome your feedback! Email us at feedback@globalgoodsindex.com
